TextView.android:text: Industrial Training is an organized activity focusing on skill, information to improve and enhance the performance of individuals to meet their career goals. Itâ€™s not only for students; it is beneficial for all the employees and job seekers. Our main focus is on live projects training sessions as it will help the individuals to get the experience of corporate world. Industrial training gives students a feel of how their work environment will be when they get placement. It gives students the exposure of tools which are used in the industry. This will make student understand and expert. We provide placements to all deserving candidates. It helps the students to differentiate between what they are doing in the college and what is there in the industry.
